title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the AIArchitectAssistant system, including the specific features and capabilities it should have, the types of architectural designs it should support, the building codes and optimization factors it should consider, and the target users (e.g., architects, engineers, contractors).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the AIArchitectAssistant system, including the different components, their interactions, and the data flow.

title: Develop AI Model
description: Develop and train the AI model(s) responsible for generating architectural design options, checking building codes, and optimizing for factors like energy efficiency and cost.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for architects to interact with the AIArchitectAssistant system, including input and output interfaces, visualization tools, and user experience considerations.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services and APIs required for the AIArchitectAssistant system, including data management, model integration, and communication with external services or databases.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Set up the development and testing environment for the AIArchitectAssistant system, including version control, continuous integration, and automated testing frameworks.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure the AIArchitectAssistant system is secure and compliant with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and create test cases to ensure the AIArchitectAssistant system meets all requirements and functions as expected.

title: Integrate and Test System Components
description: Integrate the different components of the AIArchitectAssistant system and perform thorough testing to identify and resolve any issues or bugs.
dependencies: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the AIArchitectAssistant system to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms to ensure its ongoing performance and stability.

title: Create User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including guides, tutorials, and reference materials, to help architects effectively use the AIArchitectAssistant system.
